== Language files ==
File formating changed from <code>.lang</code> to <code>.json</code>. As a result, translation strings have changed formatting:
;Old formating:
<syntaxhighlight lang=text>
 gui.done=Done
 gui.cancel=Cancel
</syntaxhighlight>
;New formating:
<syntaxhighlight lang=json>
{
  "gui.done": "Done",
  "gui.cancel": "Cancel"
}
</syntaxhighlight>
See [[Java Edition Flattening#Game assets]] for the lists of all translation keys changed
